entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:09 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening then clear. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
